title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.60 - Poisonous and toxic materials; restrictions; labeling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.60 - Poisonous and toxic materials; restrictions; labeling

State Regulations
(a) Poisonous and toxic materials required to maintain sanitary conditions, which includes pest control and sanitization, used in vending machine operations are restricted to those prominently labeled and lawfully permitted under State and Federal regulations. (b) Bactericides, cleaning compounds or other materials used on food-contact surfaces are not to leave toxic residues on such surfaces. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.60

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
